feed.title: Reza Faezi
feed.subtitle: A minimal blog for sharing things I have learned.

entry.title: Journey To Cyber Security
entry.summary: When I was younger I associated the use of computers with entertainment without being aware what was possible, let alone what kind of jobs were out there. Fast forward few years when I saw an article about IT industry being in danger due to manpower shortage in cyber security space. This piqued my curiosity as I was not aware of cyber security nor what it stands to achieve. “There more I l...
